sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When an incident is resolved / closed - once re-open, a new SLA counter will start</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>requested</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Lewis Murrell">ae97913e4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c768</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="BrightStarr" name="BrightStarr">2b33a4124fa463007e72aa95d310c7c7</assignment_group> <category display_value="SLA/OLA">40650ee74fe423007e72aa95d310c7e9</category> <company display_value="BrightStarr">c507ddfa4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c79b</company> <description>When an incident is closed or resolved the SLA should not pause, it should complete if the ticket is then re-opened the SLA should start new</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:30:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001148</number> <package display_value="PACK0001014">5c60ee324f60e3007e72aa95d310c73c</package> <short_description/> <solution_description/> <state>cancelled</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-02 15:23:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1e10665f4f30ab007e72aa95d310c75b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-04 08:59:27</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
